segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: Hello, I'm here to help you understand our platform and answer any questions you might have.

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: Do you prefer a more casual onboarding or a professional onboarding?

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: Also, before we dive in, could you share your screen?

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: That way I can see exactly what you're looking at and guide you more effectively.

segments.speaker: User
segments.text: Before that, could you speak Russian? I really want to speak Russian and not English.

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: Of course, no problem. I will speak Russian with you.

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: So, as we agreed, before we start, please share your screen so I can see what you're doing.

segments.speaker: User
segments.text: Yes, I'm on the Meeting Links page.

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: Great, I see your screen. Now we will create an organization on the profile page.

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: First, please click on the profile button on the side panel.

segments.speaker: User
segments.text: It doesn't exist.

segments.speaker: User
segments.text: I don't have such a button.

segments.speaker: Unknown
segments.text: I see.

segments.speaker: Uncertain
segments.text: Hello? Hello?

segments.speaker: Uncertain
segments.text: Hello, how can I help you?

segments.speaker: User
segments.text: No, no, no, we spoke Russian. What is it? Why are you speaking English?

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: Of course, we will continue in Russian.

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: As we agreed, the profile button on the side panel is not available.

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: Perhaps it's called differently.

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: Or maybe you are already on the profile page.

segments.speaker: Agent
segments.text: Yes, I see.
